ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound pork spare ribs, cut into 1-inch pieces
3 lotus roots, peeled and cut into 1/3-inch slices

cookingTips: Blanch the pork ribs first to remove impurities for a clearer broth
Dried scallops add umami depth; rehydrate briefly before adding to maximize flavor
Lotus root softens as it simmers; add toward the end to maintain some texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you extract maximum flavor from the dried scallops without overpowering the delicate lotus root, and what makes this a balanced, restorative broth?
